Posts.Content: On Jun 27, 2012 2:04 AM SMSGNJ wrote: I am 7 months post breast cancer radiation.  Stage 1, lumpectomy, no chemo and now on Arimidex.  i have noticed over the last few months a tenderness in my ribs on the side where I had radiation.  I have read that this could be a side effect of radiation by my Rad Onc says no.  Anybody experience this?  Many thanks! Hello.. l too have sore ribs..Just started with them seeing the onc. in two weeks..l refused Tamoxafin and they want me to go on Arimidex.. But after reading all the blogs on it, not sure l want to go on that either..i wonder if there are any natural estro blockers out there..?? i know of some women that have taken no medication and they are still cancer free..And that is stage 3-4 not stage 1 no chemo.. ?  not sure i want to talk the stuff.?
Posts.Title: Tender ribs after breast cancer radiation
